title: Singapore chilli crab with egg noodles
description: This fiery, full-flavoured Singapore-style dish is a quick and easy substitute for a Friday night takeaway.
ingredients: 10cm/4in piece fresh root ginger, peeled, finely chopped
4 spring onions, root trimmed, green and white parts roughly chopped
1 x 1kg/2lb 4oz whole cooked crab, dead man’s fingers removed, crabmeat chopped
2 tbsp roughly chopped fresh mint leaves
